title: MP Suren Raghavan stripped of all SLFP portfolios
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The General Secretary of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP), Dayasiri Jayasekara has directed a letter newly appointed State Minister and SLFP MP Suren Raghavan that he will be stripped of his positions within the party.

Moreover, the MP has been stripped of the portfolios of Deputy Secretary, Vanni District Representative and International Affairs Secretary of the party, per the instructions of the Party Leader MP Maithripala Sirisena.
Disciplinary action will also be taken against MP Raghavan, the letter addressed by MP Jayasekara adds.
